abstract: Amin Zoufonoun, director of corporate development at Google, has been hired away by Facebook to lead its mergers and acquisitions team.
snippet: Amin Zoufonoun, director of corporate development at Google, has been hired away by Facebook to lead its mergers and acquisitions team.
lead_paragraph: 3:51 a.m. | Updated Amin Zoufonoun, director of corporate development at Google, has been hired away by Facebook to lead its mergers and acquisitions team, a sign of the growing competition between two tech giants searching for start-ups and talent.

headline.main: Facebook Said to Hire Google Executive for M.&A.
